item.description:
Madison Wine Exchange’s 2nd Annual From Hops To Hope Charity Beer Festival

 

The Madison Wine Exchange is proud to announce the 2nd Annual From Hops To Hope Craft Beer Charity Festival at the Deacon John Grave House in Madison at 581 Boston Post Road.  From Hops To Hope is to help raise money for The Sarah Foundation and its collective family of agencies.  There will be over 40 microbreweries from all over the country pouring some of the greatest beer available.

 

Check back for an updated list of breweries as a complete list will be up shortly. Tickets are $30 which include admission, 5 drink tickets and 1 food ticket.  Additional beer tickets will be sold for $1 and additional food tickets will be sold for $2.  ALL PROCEEDS going to help those in need!

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: From Hops To Hope Charity Craft Beer Festival
